section.title: XSP Documentation
section.para: XSP is an XML dialect for executing code in the web server that utilises embedded code, extensible tag libraries, and transformation techniques.

XSP was originally invented for the Cocoon project. By using their standard, scripts that are built for Cocoon are easier to port to AxKit (although its worth noting that Cocoon does not support XSP's written in Perl, nor does AxKit support XSP's written in Java at the time of this writing).
Please see the links in the sidebar to find the rest of the XSP documentation.
